mapper.select: SELECT board_idx, title, hit_cnt, DATE_FORMAT(created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_datetime FROM t_board WHERE deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY board_idx DESC
SELECT board_idx, title, contents, hit_cnt, DATE_FORMAT(created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_datetime, created_id FROM t_board WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx} AND deleted_yn = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE t_board SET hit_cnt = hit_cnt + 1 WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (title, contents, created_datetime, created_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{contents}, NOW() , #{createdId})

INSERT INTO t_file (board_idx, original_file_name, stored_file_path, file_size, created_id, created_datetime) VALUES
( #{item.boardIdx}, #{item.originalFileName}, #{item.storedFilePath}, #{item.fileSize}, 'admin', NOW() )
